1.title: Here Comes the Bride
1.plot: When Dave opens an all male bridal salon opposite his ex best friend Shelley's bridal store, the wedding dress wars begin. Shelley lays down her old school rules for new girl Tiffany while a picky Bohemian bride Erin is a tricky customer for Dave's male consultants. Dave's guys go head to head with Shelley's girls to find bride Elisa her dream Kate Middleton dress and prove they are the Best in Bridal.

2.title: Bridal Beef(Cake)
2.plot: An all-guys bridal store competes with an all-girls salon to be the Best in Bridal in a Sale Day showdown. Dave's hot guys don spray tans and shirtless tuxedos to lure customers from Shelley's traditional bridal salon. But the guys may have pushed the boundaries too far, as a mother of the bride disapproves when buff consultant Frank helps her daughter try on mermaid dresses.

3.title: Monkey Business
3.plot: Shelley and Dave may rave about their pet dogs but it's a bride shopping for a dress with her monkeys that has everyone talking. At Shelley's, bride Lisa's high expectations come up hard against her low budget, while Frank wrangles a cougar.

4.title: Too Sexy for the Dress
4.plot: Complete Bridal owner, Dave relishes his victory when he secures one of Shelley's designers but tempers flare when he confronts her about the past.The stores compete to find dresses for two very different brides; Egyptian bride Nora wants a dress with maximum coverage while sassy Erika wants a wedding gown she can rip off for a surprise first dance.

5.title: All on the Line
5.plot: Bride Jensine is looking to trade her army fatigues for a super sexy gown. At Bridal Market in Chicago, Dave tries to steal Shelley's designers while Brandon, left holding the fort, struggles to hold his own against Tasha's merciless bridesmaids.

6.title: A Haunting in Dundee
6.plot: Dave's psychic abilities are revealed when a clairvoyant bride pays a visit. Dave sends the clairvoyant across the street to cleanse Shelley's Bridal of spirits while his staff finds a gown for a sorority girl.

7.title: Fraternizing with the Enemy
7.plot: When Dave's boys can't satisfy a picky customer, Dave sends the bride across the street for Shelley to deal with. Meanwhile Shelley's love life finds itself in the spotlight when flirtations between Shelley's Bridal and Complete Bridal begin to heat up.

8.title: Fiance Fiasco
8.plot: The boys at Complete Bridal must be on their best behavior when a bride brings her fiance to the appointment. The ladies at Shelley's Bridal must find a dress for a woman who is yet to be engaged. Dave and Shelley compete for traffic at the Bridal Expo.

9.title: Bride's Got a Secret
9.plot: Dave sends a secret shopper to spy at Shelley's. Bride Ania is shopping with her fiance but doesn't want him to see the dress she chooses, while Frank works with a Bride whose fiance used to date her best friend.

10.title: Fathers Know Best
10.plot:

imdb.title: Best in Bridal
plot: _Best in Bridal_ (qv) on FYI follows two Illinois bridal shops run by former friends who compete to outwit and out-sell each other in the exciting world of bridal retail.
